bibl.title: Vineyards and Gardens in Second-Century Theadelpheia.
bibl.note: Focuses on a group of documents published in B.G.U. IX, which throw an important light on the type of land commonly called 'garden land', the taxes levied on it, and the way payment of these taxes was organized.

bibl.title: Politics, Administration and Society in the Hellenistic and Roman World. Proceedings of the International Colloquium, Bertinoro 19-24 July 1997

bibl.seg: FRANCE Jacques, Vineyards and Gardens in Second-Century Theadelpheia.

Leon MOOREN (Ed.), Politics, Administration and Society in the Hellenistic and Roman World. Proceedings of the International Colloquium, Bertinoro 19-24 July 1997 = Studia Hellenistica. 36 (Leuven, 2000) pp. 91-105.

Focuses on a group of documents published in B.G.U. IX, which throw an important light on the type of land commonly called 'garden land', the taxes levied on it, and the way payment of these taxes was organized.
